name: Dungeon of Chaos (Matty1301, Parker Walker, k_z_2007)
name_original: Dungeon of Chaos (Matty1301, Parker Walker, k_z_2007)
description:
Controls:
  • wasd or arrow keys to move
  • Move mouse to change facing direction
  • Mouse click to attack
Objectives:
  • Find and defeat the goblin warchief to complete the dungeon
  • Pickup jewels and other collectibles along the way to help you
Credits:
  •   Programming, SFX, Design: Matty1301 k-z-2007
  •   Music: Parker Walker
